The Ashes of the Fallen Fires

name: The Ashes of the Fallen Fires
summary: "From the ashes of the fallen fires, you crawl out of the dark shell that was your prison. Go now into the world that is all but forgotten. Embark on an epic and unexpected adventure." It's sounds well right? But, all that we said before, is a lie. This is a short game that teaches you important lessons about expectations, debugging, taking care of your system and repairing that which breaks.
